New York University Archives
Records of the Coalition for Student Rights
New York University. Coalition for Student Rights
RG.39.112
.5 linear foot in one manuscript box
1981-1984 The Coalition for Student Rights at New York University (NYU) was formed in 1981 to seek greater student participation in institutional decision making at NYU. This collection consists of organization materials, including newsletters, a bill of rights, and student surveys. Materials are in English. Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use. Please request materials at least two business days prior to your research visit to coordinate access.
Arrangement
Materials are arranged in their original order.
Historical Note
The Coalition for Student Rights at New York University (NYU) was formed in 1981 to seek greater student participation in institutional decision making at NYU. Specifically, the coalition sought more student representation on decision making bodies and greater involvement in grading policies, budget formulation, financial aid decisions, faculty and staff hiring, student housing, minority recruitment, and placement.
Conditions Governing Access
Material pertaining to individual student records may be restricted in accordance with the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA). Please contact the Archives with specific questions regarding access to such records.
Conditions Governing Use
Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) held by the creator are maintained by New York University. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from New York University Archives, (212) 998-2646, university-archives@nyu.edu.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Donated by the Coalition for Student Rights in 1993.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date (if known); Records of the Coalition for Student Rights; RG 39.112; box number; folder number; New York University Archives, New York University Libraries.
Processing Information
Materials were placed in new acid-free folders and manuscript box. Some weeding was done by the University Archivist.
Scope and Contents
This collection consists of organizational records of the Coalition for Student Rights at NYU. Record types include newsletter galleys and articles, flyers, and survey forms.
Surveys (documents). Newsletters. New York University. Students
RESTRICTED files, plus: Student Bill of Rights, newsletters, flyers, student survey forms1981-198411-6
